entry.title: centos/fedro python3.7 install
entry.content: Centos/Fedora install python3.7config compile enviroment1yum install gcc download latest source code1wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.7.0/Python-3.7.0.tgz extract the downloaded package1tar xzf Python-3.7.0.tgz compile python source code123cd Python-3.4.8./configure --enable-optimizationsmake altinstall check1Python3.7 --version otherswhen compile the source code , may be require zlib and ctype 123yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ yum -y install zlib zlib-develyum -y install libffi-devel

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
